Detailed Description

Contains all functions and utilities which are provided by this library for parsing of chemical formulas in ASCII notation.

Typedef Documentation

Function Documentation

std::string cfp::toMarkup ( const cfp::Compound &  el  ) 

String representation of a Compound with markup text formatting.

This includes <sup> for the nucleon number and <sub> for the coefficient value of the elements.

Returns:
The formatted string for this Compound.
See also:
toString(const cfp::Compound&)
